title: Why do we pit Raptor versus Malicious when the true rivalry should be MM vs Worst Morde NA?

replies.body:
Adam Harrington

I mean is this some kind of sick joke?

I could never top such greatness!
I'll legitimately raid RiotHQ if they replace him as the voice of Morde.
https://m.popkey.co/ac6a4c/oDb37.gif
http://24.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m1ub5u22aJ1r2xijoo1_250.png
Doesn't he already voice Mordekaiser?  Along with Ryze, Karthus, Shaco, and Kassadin?

If you need an axe, you 'ave mine

(also while we're there, we ought to convince riot to make a traditional sion skin with arnold voicing the lines.)
I thought we were taking a break from this stuff for a little bit...

War.

War never changes.
http://images.memes.com/meme/249391
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=obaz3WLpEfE
But that all changed when the fire nation attacked.
This thing is going to have a FALLOUT eventually

Because one's a shipping war, another is who's the best Morde...

I'm yet to see a memer that's either another Teemo, a Rumble or a Tristana.

Or ANY YORDLE for my care.

Plot twist:
Morde's just three yordles in an iron suit-
http://pre13.deviantart.net/1a31/th/pre/i/2012/236/6/b/lol_comic_contest____rumble__s_best_suit___by_farahboom-d5c83x4.jpg
Bruh, you've been chatting with a Rumble main for over 3 hours.
Could had fooled me. Then again, your attitude nearly matches Rumble, so i'll believe it.

oh come on guys
you all know the REAL answer....

option 4 - CertainlyT

*runs back into the jungle to hide*
https://i.makeagif.com/media/8-14-2015/DWKszn.gif
https://media.riffsy.com/images/1bf8e3e9e396260a47ac051722159b28/raw

Recently it seems that it would be more of Fish against Raptor... things are different. I don't know what happened between them, and it really is a valiant effort on the rest of the people like Malicious to keep the jokes going. But just, things feel weird now. I was the only one to say anything when Raptor and Fish had their big fight in that one post on the front page, this one: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/k5eJy7RP-when-someone-claims-to-be-a-girl
I just feel like everyone is ignoring the elephant in the room, but you can't. You can't ignore something like this happening on somewhere as interconnected as the Boards. Sorry if I made this joke post have a different tone, you can ignore me or downvote if you please. I won't be upset.

It's fine

we just need to take a rest from all the silly drama we are making and go back to all the lols this board needs to have

We ain't the Gameplay Section... The salty bastards yelling at riot 

We the Memes and Games section... We enjoy poking fun and goofing off

It's awesome that we have regular pillars in this community and I admit:

IT'S HILARIOUS WHEN SHIT GOES DOWN SOMETIMES... at least for me... Till it gets personal. 

Which it has

I know. Its just that Raptor and Fish are such big names here on the Boards, and they've gotten so personal in their insults. I really didn't expect that kind of response from Fish. Now when I look at his posts on the front page, I just can't see them the same. I have to call into question whether or not he takes his popularity seriously or as a joke like the rest of us. But I guess the best thing to do is try to wait for it to end.

It won't end... But maybe we could try this?

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/QTuQky66-dramaclick-bait-psa-thingy
I'll try man. But things have already gone way too far, know what I mean?
I do... But maybe it will help for future reference

LMFAO! I finally see what they were talking about hhaa.

That Raptor sure is sensitive lol.
http://i.imgur.com/HACUk.jpg?noredirect
Who the hell is Adam Harrington

> [{quoted}](name=billxx,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=J7cwXwtJ,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2016-06-16T14:51:38.868+0000)
>
> Who the hell is Adam Harrington

A god amongst men.
Mordekaiser's Voice Actor.
K thanks mm
I'm glad the boards know who Adam Harrington is well enough to keep him in the lead at the time of my posting.
